name: Oil Tanker Fuel Transport
description:
Be ready to play Oil Tanker Fuel Transport in which you go to oil refinery station and load petrol tanker for delivering oil tank to petrol and diesel station during driving the driver face off-road roads and mountain.

Feature:
• 3D Realistic environment with 3D Graphic
• Get Challenge to enjoy base mission
• Realistic driving control of big truck
• User Friendly game play
